headline: Intercontinental Exchange’s Q4 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: Intercontinental Exchange delivered a stronger-than-expected Q4, as revenue and non-GAAP EPS both exceeded Wall Street’s expectations, resulting in a positive market reaction. Management attributed the quarter’s results to broad-based growth across its exchange, fixed income, and mortgage technology segments. CEO Jeffrey Sprecher highlighted the “mission-critical nature” of ICE’s platforms during ongoing geopolitical and macroeconomic volatility, while CFO Warren Gardiner emphasized outperforman
